subject: how acai bowls became all the rage

scene1.narration: Remember when breakfast was just cereal and toast? Then Instagram happened, and suddenly everyone needed their morning meal to look like edible art.
scene1.image: Split screen showing a plain bowl of cereal on the left versus a vibrant purple acai bowl topped with colorful berries, coconut flakes, and granola arranged in perfect geometric patterns on the right

scene2.narration: Now acai bowls are everywhere - from corner cafes to airport kiosks. Because apparently, we don't just eat breakfast anymore, we photograph it first.
scene2.image: Hands holding a smartphone taking a photo of a beautifully arranged acai bowl, with cafe setting in background and other customers doing the same at nearby tables

storyboard.fullNarration:
Remember when breakfast was just cereal and toast? Then Instagram happened, and suddenly everyone needed their morning meal to look like edible art.

Now acai bowls are everywhere - from corner cafes to airport kiosks. Because apparently, we don't just eat breakfast anymore, we photograph it first.
